description.narrative: The Engagement Facility provides a rapid and flexible response mechanism to support upstream policy results and test innovations with scaling-up potential, and should support results identified in the Country Programme Document.

condition.narrative: UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
